There are no subtitles here other than Dutch, which it is not possible to remove. Sound is a bit poor in places too. Have to look elsewhere for a decent rip.

Ok I've figured out what's wrong with this. It plays ok on PC but goes completely wrong on DVD player. The files on here have been messed about with. Consequently, when I remove the piracy trailer, the opening movie menu skips past and subtitles are not available. This needs to be submitted again with no editing.
